attributes.action: enforce a three strike rule for Jobseekers/ Benefit Claimers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If after three refused attempts to accept employment or three weak excuses, the benefit claimer should have his benefit withdrawn and be put into a position that will be deemed suitable by an employment agent at a job centre.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
